html:
10.1.24  9:03 am   WHat was going through your head when you made _____notbugs?

      hopefully next week's can be more substantial

10.1.24  8:42 am   Why do weeks tend to begin with a Monday?

      because it was that way the previous week

10.1.24  8:17 am   WHy did the chicken cross the road?

      exposure therapy, to overcome the fear of crossing the road

10.1.24  7:02 am   Parentheses or parentheticals?

      parentheses are the symbols that go around it. the parenthetical is probably the contents in between

10.1.24  1:51 am   what is physically impossible?

      probably nothing

10.1.24  1:13 am   should i sleep even though i havent reached my (self-created) deadline or should i see what i can get done before daybreak

      it depends how much physical damage you've already done to yourself, in the course of your life from past sleep deprivation so far

10.1.24  1:06 am   What's the most music there is?

      it's the moment when you make a new piece of music, to add to the pile

10.1.24  12:36 am   do you find comfort in the rain?

      yes, unless it's dangerously severe

10.1.24  12:23 am   Where's the bathroom? I can't find it.

      sometimes it's on the roof

10.1.24  12:18 am   should i refer to my landlady's husband as my landlord-in-law?

      only in the storybooks





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

9.30.24  11:48 pm   you think anyone looks back at these questions and sees if you've answered

i probably wont

      in that case i won't answer it

9.30.24  11:09 pm   do you have the masculine urge to step on an 8 penny nail?

      no, thanks for asking

9.30.24  11:05 pm   Why are you making music?

      it might help

9.30.24  10:15 pm   how do you choose whether to answer serious/unserious questions?

      all questions are extremely serious just by their existence

9.30.24  10:13 pm   You are very smart but you don't take yourself too seriously

      now you've got me wondering would happen if someone took not taking themselves too seriously extremely seriously

9.30.24  8:24 pm   are you happy with your life

      sometimes

9.30.24  7:43 pm   do you consider yourself orderly?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.30.24  7:40 pm   What color is your shirt

      plain

9.30.24  6:25 pm   What is your favorite movie

      i think what i'm hearing is, you want me to say the title of 1 movie. but that would be too unfair to all the other movies

9.30.24  6:09 pm   how to feel good?

      no one knows exactly, but it happens anyway, eventually

9.30.24  5:55 pm   when is everything

      any time

9.30.24  4:16 pm   Is it cake?

      is what cake? nevermind, yes. everything is cake

9.30.24  4:00 pm   how long does writing take for your non-song vids like "Perfect"

      a little while

9.30.24  3:13 pm   Can you sing a song?

      yes

9.30.24  1:51 pm   what can i learn

      it's hard to describe exactly. but don't let that stop you

9.30.24  1:43 pm   Help! There is an eraser mark under my TAB key!

      ok, i will be right over

9.30.24  12:49 pm   how to pass my midterms

      i'm not sure

9.30.24  12:37 pm   Is Bill Wurtz himself answering these questions?

      yes, that would be me

9.30.24  12:00 pm   why are there people in my library there are never people in my library

      maybe it's mardi gras

9.30.24  11:56 am   thouhts on donuts?

      iconic

9.30.24  11:55 am   conversate with a stranger? you mean converse with a stranger?

      no

9.30.24  11:41 am   Are you normal?

      legally yes

9.30.24  11:24 am   how do i stop being a nothings person and start doing somethings

      you have to choose which thing you want

9.30.24  9:18 am   most recent epiphany youve had

      it's the same one i've had before, so i wouldn't wanna say it because it seems too obvious

9.30.24  8:36 am   how do you escape from angry wild bandits

      maybe you could just slip into the nearest indie arts & crafts store

9.30.24  8:13 am   how many pounds of cheese have you eaten this year

      i haven't been keeping track

9.30.24  6:23 am   What (music) artist do you listen to the most?

      i haven't been keeping track

9.30.24  5:23 am   Who are you

      we'll see

9.30.24  4:33 am   Do you enjoy having genuine/real conversations with other people?

      yes

9.30.24  3:02 am   sometimes i bite my toenails

      ok but would you be willing to do it on television

9.30.24  2:40 am   is 2*2 really 4

      yes, as long as the * means multiplication

9.30.24  1:00 am   what makes you make

      maybe it's your fault

9.30.24  12:53 am   How often do you remember stuff from real life while you're dreaming?

      maybe a few times per moment

9.30.24  12:01 am   Do the ends justify the means?

      not necessarily

9.29.24  11:37 pm   whenever i play on a transposed keyboard i get thrown for a loop because the notes are all different from what my mind is expecting. should i learn to overcome this?

      maybe, maybe not. it doesn't really matter

9.29.24  11:20 pm   do you think descartes came up with that famous quote of his only to annoy his rival philosopher who had previously said "cogito ergo not sum"

      no

9.29.24  9:27 pm   You seen any mineral deposits lately?

      not that i was aware of, but i don't know if i would know how to recognize them anyway

9.29.24  9:05 pm   what brought you from 'learning some instrument or whatever' to making whatever kind of music it is you make

      time

9.29.24  8:40 pm   Do you like cornbread?

      maybe

9.29.24  8:18 pm   I just heard a song for the first time and it was the exact perfect moment for me to have heard it. I doubt there has been or will be any other time in my life where I would have connected with this song more than just now. That feels so magical. Has this ever happened to you?

      yes
